page.title: 17The Holiday Camp
page.content: The holiday camp at Atherfield on the I.W. is situated on a 14 acre site on the South Coast between Cowleaze and Shepherd's Chine.The main entrance and Reception area faces the only main road in the area which is the Military Road.The camp is privately owned. Relatives and local people work there. The camp is open from May-September. The accommodation is in single storey chalets.They are comfortably furnished and adequately equipped.Athough built in lines there is plenty of space in front and behind.The camp will hold 300 guests.The facilities include a resturant serving three meals daily,a snack bar,a swimming and a paddling pool.Sports facilities include tennis, football,croquet,putting and an adventure play area.Entertainment includes competitions,swimming galas, discos and caborets in the evening.
